comment.body:
`Content signing failed
Include optional files too large 247187352B > 200000000B`

i guess once i hit 200MB in total files thinks broke. first upload worked fine but other two are fucked. i can see the files as seeding in my main client but can't see them listed or download with proxy client.

> [nofish](#comment_237_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): A pencil icon should appear when you move the mouse over your upload that allows to edit the title or delete the file

this fixed my problem as well.  i deleted the broken uploads and added a new one and it worked fine. uploads break after combined file size of uploads reach 200MB.
